conclusion: Analyze the flow pattern step by step to determine which container the liquid will flow into.
The baffles are represented by the blue, orange, and yellow lines positioned at the top of the container.
The liquid starts at point A.
The liquid flows through the baffles and then into container D.
The liquid then flows through the baffles again and into container E.
The liquid continues to flow through the baffles and into container F.
The liquid flows out of A, through the baffles, and into D.
The liquid then flows out of D and through the baffles, and into E.
The liquid continues to flow out of E and through the baffles, and into F.
The liquid will flow into container D first.
After flowing through the baffles, it will flow into container E.
Finally, it will flow into container F.
The final answer is that the liquid will flow into containers D, E, and F.
